price: E não sejais como os que dizem: "Ouvimos", enquanto não ouvem.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna qālū samiʿ'nā wahum lā yasmaʿūna
